body.name: HOTOUCH Linen Cotton Womens Short Sleeve Shirts V Neck Collared Button Down Blouse Tops with Chest Pocket
features: Premium Material: 100% cotton with unique linen texture, quite soft and comfy, moisture-wicking and cool for Spring&Summer, casual loose fit.
Classic Designs: Short Sleeve, full button up, collared v neck, single chest pocket, curved hem, avaiable in multi colors and sizes, basic but classic, linen shirts never out of trend.

2 in 1: Great for casual and work, daily basic essential. Versatile and high-end enough to deal with all sorts of situations. Perfect for leisure, business, office, college, dating and vacation beach for a fashionable and smart look

Match All Styles: Women button up linen shirts can be matched with jeans, skinny leggings, hot pants, as well as skirts ,dresses and bikinis, fashion and vintage, Hotouch button shirt is a Summer must-have for any fashion lady.
Note: 100% Cotton, the first washing will shrink. Please refer to size chart in product description page carefully before order, not amazon size chart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit and quality. Pretty pattern. Good price
reviews.reviewText: I am glad I got this one. It washed up nicely with out alot of wrinkles. Fit is true to size. I really do like the colors in the pattern. I would definitely buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality of cotton with a decent cut
reviews.reviewText: HOTOUCH Linen Cotton Womens Short Sleeve Shirts V Neck Collared Button Down Blouse Tops with Chest PocketI got this shirt because I enjoy a nice button down short sleeve shirt for work and for the outdoors in the summer. I've washed it and tried it on, but haven't worn it yet because it is out of season.It is a nice lightweight cotton, but does not feel see through. The cotton does have a slight linen-like texture. In the pictures I posted, I washed and air dried the shirt, which created a slightly wrinkled look. I can't speak to how it will look coming out of the dryer, but I suspect it would be one of those items you want to pull out and hang immediately after drying.The seams on the shirt are good quality. The inner seams are serger type seams, with nice fine stitching on visible outer seams.I usually order a size medium or small depending on the brand. From the measurements on the listing, I could have gone with a small, as the bust measurement matched mine, however I have wide shoulders so I decided to go with a medium. The cut of the shirt seems akin to a "boyfriend" or relaxed cut, so I am curious as to whether a small would have worked for me; the medium feels a little bulky. I would suggest sizing down if you are in between sizes. As far as the shoulder issue goes, there is not a shoulder seam joining the sleeve to the blouse, it is instead constructed with two pieces (front and back) put together. This may create the somewhat boxy/ less tailored feel but it also means that if you have wide or narrow shoulders you don't have to worry about the shoulder seam not matching your shoulder.Not having worn it, I don't know if the color will show sweat, but the cut seems favorable to reducing sweat on the shirt.Overall this feels like a serviceable shirt which will probably look nice tucked into pants or tied up, and probably better with some structure underneath. The one strange aspect of the shirt is the pocket. The placement and size feels off visually; it is a little small and too high. It is off just enough to make me want to get out the seam ripper and remove it.I would recommend this shirt if you want cotton/ natural fiber, and want a boxy or relaxed cut. If you like a more tailored look, you may be disappointed with this shirt.Once the weather warms up, if I have more insights after wearing the shirt, I will add that information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful work.” Comfortable and very chic

reviews.reviewerName: Striving for Fair & BalancedStriving for Fair & Balanced
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not 100% Cotton or Linen, but nice.
reviews.reviewText: Reviewing HOTOUCH Linen Shirts for Women Cotton, I don’t know why they can’t make up their mind in this listing about whether this shirt is 100% Linen or 100% Cotton. They’re not the same. To be honest, I don’t think it’s either. I think it’s a viscose blend. Maybe it’s blended with Cotton or Linen (in a small percent), but it’s mainly Viscose. That said, it’s a nice shirt and I think most people would agree that Viscose can be a nice fabric when finished properly, so I would’ve ordered it if they had been honest and wouldn’t have deducted any stars for it but since I suspect this is not 100% Cotton or Linen, even though it says it’s 100% Cotton, I’m removing one star. I have a relative that is allergic to Viscose, so if she had ordered this, she would’ve had to send it back. Not accurately reflecting the material is a big deal.That said, the shirt is nice. It’s not so thick it’s hot, but it’s not so thin that it’s transparent. It’s a nice, summer weight. As with all made-for-amz brand clothing, I ordered a size up (also to protect from shrinking, since I thought it was going to be 100% cotton). It fits well. One thing that I often find annoying with the cheaper clothes on amz, is the buttonholes. They are usually too small for the buttons, but this shirt doesn’t have that issue. The buttonholes are sized nicely for the buttons that are on it.This shirt needs to be ironed with first use, mainly because of being compressed during shipping. Since it’s not pure cotton, it stays surprisingly unwrinkled as long as you take it out of the dryer promptly. I chose to hang dry, which does require a light steaming. The color is a nice, muted Rose (I ordered Rusty Rose) and it doesn’t bleed in the wash. Overall, I really like this shirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Cotton Linen Women’s Short Sleeve Shirt
reviews.reviewText: Review for: HOTOUCH Linen Cotton Womens Short Sleeve Shirts V Neck Collared Button Down Blouse Tops with Chest Pocket – Medium Light greenI like that this shirt is 100% cotton, the material is linen and a lower number thread count. Feels soft considering the lower thread count, overall great cotton shirt. The sleeve openings are large and airy. Will update after washing a couple of times. I have the size Medium Light green and fits well. Great shirt for everyday use, hiking and at the beach.Overall 4.3 stars taking into consideration the products description, quality, features, value and cost of 23.99, and there was a discount that further brought the price down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just as advertised!
reviews.reviewText: For once, I have received an item that looks exactly like it does in the ad pics!! That was certainly a pleasant and unexpected surprise. I like this shirt very much. It fits really well and is very well made too! I like that it has a pocket in the front. I always think that a pocket makes any shirt look better. The fit is perfect for me...it is not loose and it is not close fitting either. What I also like about this shirt is that it can be dressed up or down and still look very good. Because of this style versality, I have worn this shirt on casual Friday and also during the week when business casual is required. I got this shirt in pink and it is very pink and I absolutely love the color!! The collar was a little weird-fitting when I got it, but that settled out a bit. I think it was weird because of the way it was packaged. Anyway, I am over the top pleased with this shirt! I like it so much that I am considering purchasing another one in another color that I've had my eye on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Linen Cotton Top
reviews.reviewText: I like this top!Pros:-It's cute color-Good fit on my 5'1, 110lb body.-Good length; it's a little longer but can be tucked in and styled.Con (for me):-The texture is not as soft as I would like, but hoping that with some washes it will soften up.
